data.name: Welcome To The Backrooms
data.detailed_description:
Roadmap


About the Game

Welcome To The Backrooms


Don't lose yourself in the endless labyrinth of hallways, elevators, and entities as you traverse through the backrooms collecting essential resources along the way. Craft an endless supply of fully customizable weapons all the way down to the type of materials you use for the handles, blades, etc. Explore all sorts of weird areas and liminal spaces with outcomes completely determined by your wits and knowledge of the backrooms...

Features:

  • In depth player health system including: Sanity, Thirst, Stamina, Heartrate, Enhanced Blood System, and Body Temperature.
  • Infinite, procedurally generated levels with fully random entity encounters. Sandbox open world.
  • Crude crafting system and Building system to allow you to protect yourself from the horrors of the Backrooms.
  • Random lore to uncover in your journey through the backrooms.

data.short_description: Welcome to the Backrooms is a indie horror game developed by Brickmade Productions. This game will bring you the ultimate Backrooms survival experience, crafting, lore, entity's and a very in-depth health system which will keep you checking your watch non-stop.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1660 TI
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2XXX
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Elements of Psychological horror. Blood and gore. Self harm.
